title: Executive Order 5137-Establishing Carbury, North Dakota as a Customs Port of Entry
content: By virtue of the authority vested in ine by the Act of Congress approved August 1, 1914, making appropriations for the sundry civil expenses of the Government for the fiscal year ended June 30, 1915, Carbury, North Dakota, is hereby created a port of entry in Customs Collection District No. 34 (Dakota), with headquarters at Pembina, North Dakota, effective thirty days from the date of this Order.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5137-Establishing Carbury, North Dakota as a Customs Port of Entry Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/360837
